title: Can't even see your Champions?
body:
Why have Riot not allowed us to see our Champion Roster during Champ Select. It's kinda stupid to only allow us to see it when it is our turn to choose who we want to play. This is probably a reason why people forget to lock in, because they're too busy trying to find a champ to play. 

Please Rito, bring back the Roster for the FULL duration of Champ Select.
